Hey, I'm Jamal. I'm a front end web developer with over five of experience working in digital and advertising agencies.

I've had the privilege to work with companies and organizations such as The New York Times, Umbro, The New England Aquarium, Tracksmith, Master & Dynamic, R+Co, Natural Retreats & RED.


Occasionally I take photos.
